text: For her first royal engagement since attending Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's royal wedding, Kate Middleton has stepped out for Prince Louis christening wearing a chic cream Alexander McQueen dress. Getty Images Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Attending the royal baby's christening at The Chapel Royal, St James ’ s Palace, the mother - of - three looked stunning an over - the - knee dress with a exaggerated shoulder detailing ( similar available here ). She teamed the look with a hat by Jane Taylor ( similar here ). Getty Images After a brief service, Kate gave royal fans another glimpse of her stunning look. The Cambridge family after Prince Louis ’ s christening. pic. twitter. com / 5rYUVvYttX —
